name: Penguins 'N Pancakes
description:
So I decided to do a one hour challenge after seeing many people doing the same. I made this game in return. It's quite difficult, so good luck. (There's also an extremely game breaking bug, so sorry about that, this game was made in an hour ^^; )

HOW TO PLAY:

You are a penguin who is very hungry, and so you must eat the pancakes that are falling out of the sky. The gameplay is simple - consume as many pancakes as you can without them either touching the floor or you falling into the gap in the level, otherwise it's game over. Eating a pancake will increase your score.

For some reason you can keep on playing the game even when you get a game over. Just press "R" if you fail if you want to keep things fair, otherwise you can continue playing (it's your decision, after all).

CONTROLS:

Left and Right arrow keys - move left and right

Up arrow key - jump

CREDITS:

Made with Godot 3.2.3

Art created by Grafxkid
